# Battery technology for the next generation of transportation
Enabling fast charge, long life batteries for the next generation of transport
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e62826195cd6c5c823020/64b0696138f11fe4effc5149_shutterstock_1868935168-e1642430422297.jpg)
# Powering the future of mobility
Enabling fast charge, long life batteries for the next generation of electric mobility, from land to air.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e62826195cd6c5c823020/64b0696138f11fe4effc5149_shutterstock_1868935168-e1642430422297.jpg)
# Powering the future of mobility
Enabling fast charge, long life batteries for the next generation of electric mobility, from land to air.
# Batteries for thefuture of mobility
Enabling low-cost, safe and fast charging batteries with long lifespans for all of electric mobility — from land to air.
# Batteries for thefuture of mobility
Low-cost, safe, fast charging batteries for all of electric mobility — from land to air.
#### Advancing beyond Li-ion with Li-metal
Li-ion battery technology is at its limit. To achieve cost parity with gasoline-powered vehicles, current batteries need to be lighter, hold more energy, and surpass their fundamental limitations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e62826195cd6c5c823020/658350f8417bc06d947dc610_rectangular-battery-gb.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e62826195cd6c5c823020/6585c97f2ca4f18d3d54fc9e_white-battery.jpg)
#### Our intelligent Li-metal batteries 
By incorporating an intelligent, adaptive battery management system within the cell structure, we ensure optimal performance and extend the lifespan of each battery. The outcome is a reliable, high-performing battery solution that offers exceptional value for all applications in electric mobility.
#### The optimal mix of performance to enable all e-mobility
#### < 15 minutes
### Fast Charge
Charge quickly, with up to 4x faster charging than conventional Li-ion batteries.
####  450+ Wh/kg
### High Density
and 1000+ Wh/L. With up to 2x higher energy density than conventional Li-ion batteries.
#### 500+ cycles
### Safe, Long life
Intelligent algorithms to mitigate failure mechanisms impairing safety and cycle life.
#### At the forefront of adaptive battery technology
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e62826195cd6c5c823020/657c96b8abccb2388b93a8b4_lab.webp)
1000's
### battery cells
tested, encompassing different Li-ion chemistries and form factors for various end applications
50 billion+
### data points
acquired to date, utilized to develop our Intelligent Battery Management System
9 years +
### of research
and development in adaptive battery charging technology
60+
### patents
granted and pending, composed of several patent families with global coverage 
### Enabling ultimate safety & performance
Peak performance with uncompromising safety is achieved by integrating smart adaptive battery management with each Li-metal battery cell.
### Preventing Dendrite Formation
![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628299f8aa233b83918e24fd_Pause.svg)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628298b20ae0236682d4b87f_Play-24.svg)
### The solution is intelligent battery management.
Our intelligent battery management system ensures reliable performance and predictable battery health for Li-metal batteries by actively reducing irreversible internal damage.
### Unsafe Dendrite Formation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e62826195cd6c5c823020/6585d0703686adde67ab70da_li-dendrite-white.jpg)
### Li-metal batteries can be unstable.
Conventional charging leads to formation of dendrites, which can grow from one electrode to another, causing rapid degradation or catastrophic failure. 
#### Battery technology making all-electric aircraft, cars, and the future of e-mobility a reality
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e62826195cd6c5c823020/64ee071fc6e9f2e4961a7a4d_up-close-airplane.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e62826195cd6c5c823020/64ee075ef0d1d2aac4937bcf_up-close-car.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e62826195cd6c5c823020/64ee079551195f65a98fa9c6_up-close-drone.png)
#### Making electric flight feasible
### Backed by notable investors
Including:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e62826195cd6c5c823020/6585ddd5e7d46c6083dfcd30_investor%20Logos.png)
As seen on:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e62826195cd6c5c823020/6585ddff4e111a123b737c61_press%20logos.png)
#### Building complete battery solutions, from single cell to pack

generated_description:
### GBatteries Overview

**Company Name:** GBatteries  
**Founded:** 2014  
**Location:** Ottawa, Canada  
**Team Size:** 25 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W14  
**Website:** [gbatteries.com](https://www.gbatteries.com)

---

**Mission Statement:**  
GBatteries aims to revolutionize the battery charging experience by enabling lithium-ion batteries to charge ultra-fast without compromising their lifespan or safety. Their technology is not just about speed; it’s designed to retain battery integrity over time, addressing the critical limitations of conventional battery technology.

**Core Technology:**  
At the heart of GBatteries’ innovation are smart control algorithms integrated within an intelligent, adaptive battery management system. This allows their Li-metal batteries to achieve impressive performance metrics:
- **Fast Charging:** Up to 4 times quicker than standard Li-ion batteries, allowing charges to be completed in under 15 minutes.
- **High Energy Density:** Achieves greater than 450 Wh/kg and 1000 Wh/L, effectively doubling the density of traditional options.
- **Longevity and Safety:** Supports over 500 charge cycles through advanced algorithms that combat failure modes.

**Sector Focus:**  
GBatteries has positioned itself as a leader in several strategic tags: energy storage, hard-tech, and climate solutions. Their products are designed for various applications across electric mobility, from cars to drones and even potential electric aircraft, making them critical players in the future of sustainable transportation.

---

**Technological Advancements:**
- **Li-metal Batteries:** Achieving the next step beyond current Li-ion technology, these batteries are engineered to be lighter, more powerful, and safe.
- **Intelligent Management:** The inclusion of adaptive systems helps mitigate common battery issues, such as dendrite formation, which can destabilize performance and safety.

**Research & Development:**  
GBatteries has invested over nine years into R&D, accumulating more than 50 billion data points to fine-tune their algorithms and battery models, alongside securing over 60 patents globally.

---

**Investor Support:**  
The company is backed by notable investors and has gained visibility through its presence in prestigious tech incubators like Y Combinator. This not only validates their approach but also positions them well for future growth in a competitive landscape.

**Conclusion:**  
GBatteries is on an exciting trajectory, leading the charge in battery technology that promises to reshape electric mobility. With a commitment to safety, performance, and sustainability, they are not just building batteries—they are powering the future of transportation. If you're interested in the next generation of energy solutions, GBatteries is definitely one to watch.
